title: 2 Newark Police Officers Shot by Gunman on Rooftop, Officials Say
description: One officer was shot in the shoulder and the other one was shot in the leg by a person firing a long gun, according to law enforcement officials.
dc:creator: Liam Stack, Tracey Tully and Sarah Maslin Nir
media:credit: Bryan Anselm for The New York Times
media:description: The police blocked off an intersection in Newark, N.J., on Tuesday afternoon following a reported shooting.
